metadata.description: SPLATTERMAN is the blood soaked story of two comic creators and their ultimate horror character creation gone very bad. A 'done-in-one' graphic novella that truly lives up to its title, it's all brought to you by the twisted minds of JIMMY PALMIOTTI and JUSTIN GRAY (JONAH HEX, POWERGIRL, BACK TO BROOKLYN) and illustrated by GIANCARLO CARACUZZO (THE LAST RESORT) and PAUL MOUNTS (POWERGIRL, WANTED) and lettered by BILL TORTOLINI.
metadata.name: Random Acts of Violence
